Position Title:       Line CookEmployment Type:   Full Time Salary:             up to 4K SAR depending on experience and qualifications plus centralized tips and monthly incentivesJob Location:       Riyadh, KSAAbout the Client: A stand-alone Mediterranean restaurant, serving signature burgers and beverages with multiple branches in UAE and KSAJob Description:Prepare and cook menu items according to established recipes and standards.

Monitor food stock levels and communicate with the kitchen manager to reorder supplies as needed.
Maintain cleanliness and sanitation standards in the kitchen and on their station.Skills
